data.title: Bear Pawz Massage Therapy LLC
data.meta_description: Board Certified provider James Tien, LMT. Our goals as a massage therapist, and more. Bears. Veteran health care, animals and nature, environmental.
data.text:
Hello, my name is James Tien, LMT, welcome to my official practice website for Bear Pawz Massage Therapy LLC.

I opened Bear Pawz Massage Therapy LLC in order practice my passion for bodywork, to alleviate pain and stress, empower others to love and heal themselves, to participate in activism and charitable causes, and educate the public on massage therapy and manual therapy techniques. I enjoy being a provider for plus-size individuals, LGBTQ+ individuals, veterans, and many others. It is my goal to offer you the best client centered care and attention as a patron of Bear Pawz Massage Therapy. To host a non-discriminating, non-judgmental space for people of all body types, to receive professional massage therapy.

I am Board Certified in Therapeutic Massage and Bodywork by the NCBTMB. I learned massage therapy at the Denver Integrative Massage School, and trained in Swedish, Deep Tissue, and Thai Yoga massage, as well as several additional therapies. I am attuned to practice Traditional Usui Reiki, and I have taken the Upledger Institute Craniosacral Therapy 1 training as well. I graduated from Boulder, CO's Naropa University, Traditional Eastern Arts BA, Concentration in Tai Chi Chuan, with a minor in Contemplative Psychology. It is my aim as a practitioner to integrate the relaxing yet powerful principles of Tai Chi with massage therapy.
